import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar'; import { NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' import '../index.css'; const Header = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin //退出函数 const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()) } return (
{userInfo ? ( 个人详情 退出 ) : ( )}
); }; export default Header;
